import axios from"axios";export default{// Gets all transactions
getTransactions:function getTransactions(){return axios.get("/api/transactions");},// Gets the transaction with the given id
getTransaction:function getTransaction(id){return axios.get("/api/transactions/"+id);},// Deletes the transaction with the given id
deleteTransaction:function deleteTransaction(id){return axios.delete("/api/transactions/"+id);},// Saves a transaction to the database
saveTransaction:function saveTransaction(transactionData){return axios.post("/api/transactions",transactionData);}};
